special_text:
Diverge [i](Pick only one path as a sorcery to gain that type and a +1/+1 counter.)[/i]
When Still-Smoke Courser enters, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
{X}{U}{U}: Shaman
Look at the top X cards of your library. Put up to two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
{X}{B}{B}: Warrior
Each opponent loses X life and you gain X life.
